verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that in <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> they <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2596>together<s%><S%G3588>,<s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in <S%G3779>such<s%> a <S%G3779>manner<s%> that a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and of <S%G1672>Greeks.<s%>

But the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> who <S%G544>disbelieved<s%> <S%G1892>stirred<s%> up the <S%G5590>minds<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and <S%G2559>embittered<s%> them <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they <S%G1304>spent<s%> a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> [there] <S%G3955>speaking<s%> <S%G3955>boldly<s%> [with reliance] upon the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> who was <S%G3140>bearing<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of His <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G1325>granting<s%> that <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> by their <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

But the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4977>divided;<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1510>sided<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> with the <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> an <S%G3730>attempt<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> by <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> and the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> with their <S%G758>rulers,<s%> to <S%G5195>mistreat<s%> and to <S%G3036>stone<s%> them,

they became <S%G4894>aware<s%> of it and <S%G2703>fled<s%> to the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia,<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> and <S%G1191>Derbe,<s%> and the <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>region;<s%>
and <S%G2546>there<s%> they continued to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel.<s%>

And at <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> there was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G102>without<s%> <S%G102>strength<s%> in his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G5560>lame<s%> from his mother's <S%G2836>womb,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> had <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> was <S%G191>listening<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> as he <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> <S%G3739>who,<s%> when he had <S%G816>fixed<s%> his <S%G816>gaze<s%> upon him, and had <S%G3708>seen<s%> that he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to be <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4982>well,<s%>
<S%G3004>said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G450>"Stand<s%> <S%G3717>upright<s%> on your <S%G4228>feet.<s%>" And he <S%G242>leaped<s%> up and [began] to <S%G4043>walk.<s%>

And when the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%> they <S%G1869>raised<s%> their <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the <S%G3072>Lycaonian<s%> <S%G3072>language,<s%> "The <S%G2316>gods<s%> have <S%G3666>become<s%> <S%G3666>like<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> and have <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to us."
And they [began] <S%G2564>calling<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G2203>Zeus,<s%> and <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2060>Hermes,<s%> <S%G1894>because<s%> he was the <S%G2233>chief<s%> <S%G3056>speaker.<s%>

And the <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2203>Zeus,<s%> whose [temple] was <S%G4253>just<s%> <S%G4253>outside<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> and <S%G4725>garlands<s%> to the <S%G4440>gates,<s%> and <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G2380>offer<s%> <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> with the <S%G3793>crowds.<s%>

But when the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, they <S%G1284>tore<s%> their <S%G2440>robes<s%> and <S%G7061>rushed<s%> out into the <S%G3793>crowd,<s%> <S%G2896>crying<s%> out

and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G435>"Men,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are you <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>? We are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of the <S%G3663>same<s%> <S%G3663>nature<s%> as you, and <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you in order that you should <S%G1994>turn<s%> from <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%> <S%G3152>things<s%> to a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> that is in them.
"And in the <S%G1074>generations<s%> <S%G3944>gone<s%> by He <S%G1439>permitted<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> their own <S%G3598>ways;<s%>

and <S%G2543>yet<s%> He did not <S%G863>leave<s%> <S%G848>Himself<s%> <S%G267>without<s%> <S%G267>witness,<s%> in that He <S%G7500>did<s%> <S%G7500>good<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> you <S%G5205>rains<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven<s%> and <S%G2593>fruitful<s%> <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G1705>satisfying<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> with <S%G5160>food<s%> and <S%G2167>gladness.<s%> "

And [even] <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> they with <S%G3433>difficulty<s%> <S%G2664>restrained<s%> the <S%G3793>crowds<s%> from <S%G2380>offering<s%> <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> to them.

But <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1904>came<s%> from <S%G490>Antioch<s%> and <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> and having <S%G3982>won<s%> <S%G3982>over<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> they <S%G3034>stoned<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4951>dragged<s%> him out of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> him to be <S%G2348>dead.<s%>

But while the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2944>stood<s%> <S%G2944>around<s%> him, he <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G4172>city.<s%> And the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>away<s%> with <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> to <S%G1191>Derbe.<s%>

And after they had <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to that <S%G4172>city<s%> and had <S%G3100>made<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3100>disciples,<s%> they <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> and to <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> and to <S%G490>Antioch,<s%>

<S%G1991>strengthening<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3870>encouraging<s%> them to <S%G1696>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and [saying,] <S%G1223>"Through<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> we <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And when they had <S%G5500>appointed<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> for them in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> having <S%G4336>prayed<s%> with <S%G3521>fasting,<s%> they <S%G3908>commended<s%> them to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> they had <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
And they <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G4099>Pisidia<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> into <S%G3828>Pamphylia.<s%>
And when they had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> in <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G825>Attalia;<s%>

and from <S%G2547>there<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> from <S%G3606>which<s%> they had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G3860>commended<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> that they had <S%G4137>accomplished.<s%>

And when they had <S%G3854>arrived<s%> and <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> they [began] to <S%G312>report<s%> <S%G3745>all<s%> <S%G3745>things<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> with them and <S%G3754>how<s%> He had <S%G455>opened<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>
And they <S%G1304>spent<s%> a <S%G3756>long<s%> <S%G3641><s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> with the <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
